text:
when running maven build in 1.2.16

maven dependencies download mail-1.4.1.jar to user.home/.m2/repository

but build.xml files for ant still reference
${m2_repo}/javax/mail/mail/1.4/mail-1.4.jar

applies to both

apache-log4j-1.2.16\build.xml
apache-log4j-1.2.16\tests\build.xml
